analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.finalize (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d5fb1e9d2f15d9ae5d7f4af4825fdef03de9685.sol#742-753):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d5fb1e9d2f15d9ae5d7f4af4825fdef03de9685.sol#751)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d5fb1e9d2f15d9ae5d7f4af4825fdef03de9685.sol#751-753)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d5fb1e9d2f15d9ae5d7f4af4825fdef03de9685.sol#541-637):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d5fb1e9d2f15d9ae5d7f4af4825fdef03de9685.sol#549-561)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d5fb1e9d2f15d9ae5d7f4af4825fdef03de9685.sol#566-570)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d5fb1e9d2f15d9ae5d7f4af4825fdef03de9685.sol#610-611)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d5fb1e9d2f15d9ae5d7f4af4825fdef03de9685.sol#606-608)

	State variables written after the call(s):

	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d5fb1e9d2f15d9ae5d7f4af4825fdef03de9685.sol#657)
	State variables written after the call(s):

CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d5fb1e9d2f15d9ae5d7f4af4825fdef03de9685.sol#984-1005) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d5fb1e9d2f15d9ae5d7f4af4825fdef03de9685.sol#1000-1005)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d5fb1e9d2f15d9ae5d7f4af4825fdef03de9685.sol#999-1005)

CrowdsaleExt.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d5fb1e9d2f15d9ae5d7f4af4825fdef03de9685.sol#369-372)
